entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sydenham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:23 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 8:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -7.8°C

Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 84 %

Dewpoint: -10.1°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
